argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_equsb1 | |- [ y / x ] x = y |
| 2 | 1 | #P_a1bi | |- ( [ y / x ] ph <-> ( [ y / x ] x = y -> [ y / x ] ph ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_sbim | |- ( [ y / x ] ( x = y -> ph ) <-> ( [ y / x ] x = y -> [ y / x ] ph ) ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_bitr4i | |- ( [ y / x ] ph <-> [ y / x ] ( x = y -> ph ) ) |
\
 Alternate proof of ~ sbequ8 , shorter but requiring more axioms. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
